name: The Tea Room
description:
I believe you are in need of help. Something is missing in your life, no? Well, I am here to help you. If you join me in my tea room and play a simple game, I will grant you any wish. My shop opens at 2 pm. Don't be late.

The Tea Room is a turn based card game with visual novel elements. Discover the stories of five characters and why they have also been invited to the Tea Room.

The Tea Room is a student project for EAE.
